input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile

Item keywords:
Shake 'n Go Racers put the control of speed and power into kids hands
Just shake it up to start the "engine`"
The more you shake it up, the longer it goes
Hear cool phrases every time you let it go
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile and Mr. Freeze Racer
Goes up to 20 feet

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile offers kids a fun way to engage in pretend play while developing their gross motor skills.  This Batmobile features shake-activated motion and sound effects, along with cool phrases that are activated by letting go.  The Batmobile also features iconic design details from the popular DC Comics character, including a light-up nose cone and a detachable Batman figure.  Kids will love collecting all of the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends vehicles and engaging in super hero themed imaginative play.  This Batmobile is recommended for kids ages 3 years and older, and it requires 3 LR44 batteries (included).  The Batmobile measures approximately 9"L x 5"W x 6"H.
input_text.Response B: The more you shake it, the longer it goes! With the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile, kids put the power and speed of this super vehicle into their own hands. Just shake it up to start the "engine", then let it go! The more it's shaken, the further it can go - up to 20 feet! Kids will love the cool phrases that are heard each time it's set free. Collect all four of the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends vehicles: Batmobile, Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer and Mr. Freeze Racer. Each sold separately.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
